name: How I imagine Japan
description: From Dang: (Click on the screen if it take too long to load) This is the first level I made with Unity, and Maya. Press ASDW to move and SPACE to jump. The whole samurai castle was completely made out of Maya engine. The rest is asset from the store. The game has no objective, so you can only walk around.(Sorry for the latency, and long loading). Thanks for playing.
